Comments_List: Increased pedagogical skills, increased knowledge of important trends in queer theory
Very friendly instruction, great selections for readings
More time to discuss the readings! And to think about pedagogy.

I wish that our class sessions were longer so that we would have more time to discuss each text. The sessions that are exclusively for WGSS certificate workshoppers are already so few. Longer classes that started a little earlier would be ideal.
Yes! It is a great fourth course and a requirement for the WGSS Certificate.
